title: List of all Androidyoutube player   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidyoutube player   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: android-youtube-player
repoList.description: YouTube Player library for Android and Chromecast, stable and customizable.

repoList.name: YuuPlayer
repoList.description: Android Youtube Player library without any dependency, webview based.

repoList.name: youtube-android-player-helper
repoList.description: Helper library for Android developers looking to add YouTube video playback in their applications via the iframe player in WebView

repoList.name: youtubetv
repoList.description: :tv: YouTube embedded player library for Android TV

repoList.name: chromecast-youtube-player
repoList.description: Chromecast YouTube player library.

repoList.name: android_youtubePlayer
repoList.description: Practice using android studio with the youtube library

repoList.name: YoutubePlayer-Android
repoList.description: In this app i included an external(3rd) library. I used youtube player API key so the videos would play

repoList.name: YoutubePlayer
repoList.description: A preety good library for youtube player https://github.com/PierfrancescoSoffritti/android-youtube-player

repoList.name: AndroidYoutubePlayer
repoList.description: A Basic Youtube Player to explore different features of Android Programming such as creating intents, starting activities and adding 3rd party libraries to your project.

repoList.name: YoutubePlayerApp
repoList.description: Android application which incorporates the usage of third party libraries to stream youtube videos withouthaving to leave the app
